message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which we believe would greatly benefit you. Given its value and quality, I propose a price of $110 for it. This is a special introductory offer considering your interest in the product.

Thank you for the offer, Alice. While I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, $110 is unfortunately a bit more than I'm willing to spend right now. I'm happy to consider a price of $95. This would allow me to comfortably acquire the product within my budget.  Let me know what you think.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position and appreciate your willingness to meet halfway. In light of this, I am willing to consider a price of $100 for the product. I believe this aligns well with both our interests and allows for a fair transaction.
